title: Booklet, "Booklet for "Type Talks", No. 76, May-June 1954", 1954
medium: Lithography in yellow and black ink on off-white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover across the center in yellow and black: TYPE [black]/ TALKS [yellow]
At bottom in black: May-June, 1954/ Number 76
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: On the cover is the logo in yellow for the Advertising Typographers Association of America, Inc of a man working at a drafting table with the letters ATA superimposed. The booklet has 16 pages and contains text and some images. The back cover lists nationwide members.

tombstone.epitaph:
Booklet, "Booklet for "Type Talks", No. 76, May-June 1954", 1954.
1954. Lithography in yellow and black ink on off-white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-164.
